techmeme.title: Elon Musk says production of Tesla's humanoid robot, Optimus, is being affected by China's recent restrictions on exports of rare earth minerals used in magnets (Bloomberg)
Meta's Oversight Board says Meta's new speech policies were "announced hastily" in January and asks the company to assess the impact on vulnerable user groups (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
A look at Huawei's smart driving software unit, which became profitable in 2024 after revenue grew over 5x and is powering car systems by BYD, BMW, and others (Bloomberg)
Bethesda, Maryland-based AuthMind, which offers observability-based identity protection services to enterprises, raised a $19.3M seed led by Cheyenne Ventures (Dan Primack/Axios)
Mantra's CEO begins burning $80M worth of his OM tokens and plans to burn $80M worth from partners, after a 90% collapse on April 13 erased $5B+ in market value (Shaurya Malwa/CoinDesk)
